alert.note: Alert for Harris; Meriwether; Muscogee; Troup (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 4:29AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Meriwether, Muscogee, southern Troup and Harris Counties through 500 AM EDT... At 428 AM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Lakeview to near Russell County Sports Complex, and moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Columbus, Hamilton, West Point, Pine Mountain, North Fort Benning, Bibb City, Goat Rock Lake, Ellerslie, Laurel Hills, F.d. Roosevelt State Park, Green Island Hills, Vista Terrace, Cataula, Columbus Metropolitan Airport, Rose Hill, Stovall, Mountain Hill, Avondale, Fortson and Mulberry Grove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 AM EDT for west central Georgia.
